Defence.name: Assassin 's Vigor
Defence.description: Grants Health after breaking a Behemoth part.

Defence.name: Bloodless
Defence.description: Protects against Wounded and Crippling Wounds statuses.

Defence.name: Fireproof
Defence.description: Protects against being set on fire.

Defence.name: Fortress
Defence.description: Grants a small shield after avoiding damage for a short time.

Defence.name: Insulated
Defence.description: Protects against Shocked status effect and allows you to attack electric shields.

Defence.name: Nine Lives
Defence.description: Grants a chance to reduce damage, and later the ability to cheat death.

Defence.name: Shellshock Resist
Defence.description: Protects against the explosion damage and status effect Shellshock.

Defence.name: Sturdy
Defence.description: Prevents being staggered on a cooldown.

Defence.name: Warmth
Defence.description: Protects against Chilled and Frozen status effects.

Mobility.name: Agility
Mobility.description: Reduces the stamina cost of dodging.

Mobility.name: Evasion
Mobility.description: Increases the time you are invincible when dodging.

Mobility.name: Fleet Footed
Mobility.description: Temporarily increases Movement Speed after a dodge.

Mobility.name: Nimble
Mobility.description: Restores Stamina when dodging through behemoth attacks.

Mobility.name: Swift
Mobility.description: Increases Movement Speed when your weapon is sheathed.

Power.name: Aetherhunter
Power.description: Increases damage against aether charged Behemoths.

Power.name: Deconstruction
Power.description: Bonus damage against objects created by Behemoths.

Power.name: Pacifier
Power.description: Increases Stagger damage against enraged Behemoths.

Power.name: Rage
Power.description: Increases your damage when your health is low.

Technique.name: Acidic
Technique.description: Increases Wound damage at the cost of Part damage.
Technique.level01: Converts 30% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Technique.level02: Converts 40% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Technique.level03: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
Technique.level04:
Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage +
        10 % Part damage
Technique.level05:
Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage +
        15 % Part damage
Technique.level06:
Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage +
        20 % Part damage

Technique.name: Barbed
Technique.description: Adds a flat amount of Wound damage on hit.

Technique.name: Bladestorm
Technique.description: Adds a flat amount of Part damage on hit.

Technique.name: Cunning
Technique.description: Grants a chance to deal double damage.

Technique.name: Evasive Fury
Technique.description: Temporarily increases attack speed when dodging through a Behemoth's attack.

Technique.name: Merciless
Technique.description: Increases Wound damage against staggered Behemoths.

Technique.name: Wild Frenzy
Technique.description: Increases Attack Speed when at low health.

Technique.name: Weighted Strikes
Technique.description: Adds a flat amount of Stagger damage on hit. At later ranks, allows more weapon attacks to interrupt.

Utility.name: Aetherborne
Utility.description: Increases the benefits of using aether vents.

Utility.name: Aetheric Attunement
Utility.description: Percent increase to Lantern Charge gained from attacks.

Utility.name: Aetheric Frenzy
Utility.description: Gains a flat amount of Lantern Charge on each weapon hit.

Utility.name: Medic
Utility.description: Improves your ability to revive allies.

Utility.name: Stunning Vigour
Utility.description: Restores some health whenever a Behemoth is staggered.

Utility.name: Vampiric
Utility.description: Restores some health whenever a Behemoth part is Wounded.
